name: Casa De Garcia - Sumatra Blend - Belicoso
additionalNotes: Casa de Garcia Sumatra Blend ia a comprised of long filler tobaccos from Honduras and the Dominican Republic, a black Connecticut Broadleaf binder, and an exceptional Sumatra wrapper - this cigar has a solid construction and slow burn. The Sumatra blend provides complex sweet, earthy, and nutty tones with a mellow strength.
